title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
itunes:title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to NY Post Media Columnist Andrew Marchand about Amazon Prime's first NFL game last night. FOX NFL Analyst Mark Sanchez calls in to recap the game and share stories from his USC days. Plus, Arizona Republic's Duane Rankins shares what could be next for Suns Owner Robert Sarver.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
